section1.content: This Distance Selling Agreement ("Agreement") is concluded between the parties specified below in accordance with Law No. 6502 on Protection of Consumers and Distance Contracts Regulation.
section1.address: Bağlıca, Şehit Hikmet Özer Cd. No:101, Etimesgut/Ankara

section2.title: 2. Subject
section2.content: This Agreement relates to the Consumer's purchase of pet hotel and pet taxi services offered by Petfendy. The services subject to the Agreement:

section3.title: 3. Right of Withdrawal
section3.content: The Consumer may withdraw from the contract within 14 days from the date of notification of the contract, without showing any reason and without paying any penalty.
section3.rights: The right of withdrawal cannot be used in contracts where the service has been fully performed, with the consumer's consent and clearly stated before the start of service performance.
section3.period: The withdrawal period starts from the date the contract is notified to the consumer.

section4.title: 4. Payment and Invoice
section4.content: Payment can be made by credit card, debit card or other accepted payment methods. Invoice will be sent to your email address after the payment transaction is completed.
section4.item1: Payment security complies with PCI DSS standards
section4.item2: Card information is not stored and is processed encrypted
section4.item3: All payments are protected with 3D Secure
section4.item4: Invoice information is sent by email after reservation

section5.title: 5. Cancellation and Refund
section5.content: Reservation cancellations and refunds are managed within the scope of our Cancellation and Refund Policy. For detailed information, please review our Cancellation and Refund Policy page.
section5.methods: Cancellation requests must be submitted through our website or by email.

section6.content: You can contact us for all questions regarding the Agreement:

deliveryReturn.title: Delivery and Return Terms
deliveryReturn.subtitle: Information about our services and refund policy

section1.title: 1. Service Delivery
section1.content: The services we offer as Petfendy are delivered as follows:
section1.item1: Pet hotel reservations: Delivered at the check-in time specified on the reservation date
section1.item2: Pet taxi services: Delivered at the time and location specified on the reservation date
section1.item3: Reservation confirmation is notified by email and SMS for all services

section2.title: 2. Cancellation and Refund Right
section2.content: In accordance with Law No. 6502 on Protection of Consumers, you have a 14-day right of withdrawal for our services.
section2.period: The right of withdrawal can be used within 14 days from the date the reservation confirmation reaches you.
section2.note: However, the right of withdrawal cannot be used after the service has been fully performed (after the reservation date has passed).

section3.title: 3. Cancellation Conditions
section3.content: The following conditions apply for reservation cancellations:
section3.item1: Cancellations made 48 hours before the reservation date: 100% refund
section3.item2: Cancellations made 24-48 hours before the reservation date: 50% refund
section3.item3: Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the reservation date: No refund
section3.item4: Special evaluation can be made for mandatory reasons (illness, emergency, etc.)

section4.title: 4. Refund Process
section4.content: For cancelled reservations, the refund process is carried out within the following periods according to your payment method:
section4.process: Payments made by credit card: Refunded to your account within 5-7 business days. Payments made by debit card: Refunded to your account within 3-5 business days.

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: You can contact us for questions regarding cancellation and refund procedures:

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Information about cookies used on our website

section1.title: 1. What is a Cookie?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files saved to your device (computer, tablet, phone) when you visit websites. Cookies ensure the website works properly and improve user experience.
section1.purpose: On our website, cookies are used to provide site functionality, remember user preferences and for analytical purposes.

section2.title: 2. Types of Cookies Used
section2.content: The following types of cookies are used on our website:

item1.title: Essential Cookies
item1.desc: Cookies necessary to provide the basic functions of the website. The website does not work properly without these cookies.

item2.title: Performance Cookies
item2.desc: Cookies used to analyze website performance and improve user experience.

item3.title: Functionality Cookies
item3.desc: Cookies used to remember user preferences and provide a personalized experience.

item4.title: Targeting Cookies
item4.desc: Cookies used to show relevant ads to users.

section3.title: 3. Cookie Management
section3.content: You can manage or delete cookies from your browser settings. However, disabling some cookies may cause some features of the website to not work.
section3.manage: You can use your browser's settings menu to manage your cookie preferences.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
section4.content: Third-party cookies are used on our website for analytical and marketing purposes. These cookies are subject to the privacy policies of the relevant third parties.
section4.thirdParty: Third-party services used: Google Analytics, advertising platforms and social media integrations.

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: You can contact us for questions about our cookie policy:
